attributes.action: change the law to make it illegal for any action to grant amnesty to illegal immigrants to be taken without first holding a national (AND LEGALLY BINDING) referendum to find out if this is what the electorate is prepared to pay for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In every case where amnesty has been granted it has proved to have resulted in massive numbers of immigration.  This country is already overcrowded with an ever reducing number of people actually contributing taxes to pay for it.  Any new large influxes of people can only cause further damage to our culture and our infrastructure.
